snippet: Rabbi Joshua M. Davidson, 45, is taking over the oldest Reform congregation in New York City as part of a generational shift at some of the city’s major Reform institutions.
abstract: Rabbi Joshua M Davidson, 45, will be formally installed as senior rabbi of Temple Emanu-El in Manhattan, taking over the oldest Reform congregation in New York City as part of a generational shift at some of the city’s major Reform institutions.
lead_paragraph: Rabbi Joshua M. Davidson, 45, is taking over the oldest Reform congregation in New York City as part of a generational shift at some of the city’s major Reform institutions.

headline.main: At a Temple Proud of Its Traditions, a New Rabbi With ‘Alternative’ Ideas
headline.print_headline: At a Temple Proud of Its Traditions, A New Rabbi With ‘Alternative’ Ideas
